title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 132: Featuring Tyson Barrie + Erik Johnson
description:
On Monday's episode, the guys are joined by Tyson Barrie and Erik Johnson of the Colorado Avalanche. Tyson and Erik join the boys to talk about how this season is going, how good Nathan MacKinnon is, some stories from their days playing with Whit and Biz and a ton more. The guys also touch on the Tom Wilson-Ryan Reaves drama and we get another Gambling Corner from RA.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
